patthana17.25:1.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.25:2.1_0: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.25:3.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
